subtitle: 90 - Lightning Thrashes
title: 90 - Lightning Thrashes
initial_uri:
annotate:title="90 - Lightning Thrashes",description="

Music Played in This Show

  • Middle Season - Inside Out
  • Denim Cobra - Berserker
  • Riot in Progress - Heads Up
  • Bloody Times - Die in a Hole
  • Mudpit Mabel - Memories
  • Polybius - Bit
  • Cvltists - Cauterize

HELP I’m running out of music! Please send metal artists to ThunderRoad.media -  so I can play their songs!

Show notes

In order to keep my RSS feed smaller you can find detailed show notes for this episode at https://sirlibre.com/lightning-thrashes/lightning-thrashes-episode-90/

 

It has been made obvious to me that Lightning Thrashes has been a failed endeavor.

The v4v model doesn’t seem to be working for me, maybe I’m doing it wrong

I will retire this show at episode 100 which will be in August of this year (2025)

I will not be putting much effort at all into this show in the mean time.

For those of you that have given me value in return I am forever grateful to you.

I will continue doing the live shows on Saturdays for now. Lit.LightningThrashes.com

Who knows what the future holds for me. Whatever I end up doing it will be posted at SirLibre.com as well as LibreLeaf.com (Homestead site)

 

Support Lightning Thrashes V4V

  • Zelle - kolomona@kolomona.com
  • PayPal
  • Donate Page
  • Lightning Thrashes Amazon Wish List
